Class ModelInstance

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.ModelInstance
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ModelInstance extends Object implements Serializable
Class represeting an entire instance of a game of Galaxy Trucker.
See Also:

      public int getID()

    • validate

      public void validate(ServerMessage message) throws ForbiddenCallException
      Receives the ServerMessage and processes it.
      Parameters:
      message - ServerMessage Message received.
      Throws:
      ForbiddenCallException - if the model refuses the message.

    • serialize

      public void serialize()
      Forwards a request to the LobbyController to serialize the current model state.

    • pauseGame

      public void pauseGame()
      Pauses the game and doesn't allow any further action until unpaused, used to keep in line with the disconnection resilience spec.

    • unpauseGame

      public void unpauseGame()
      Unpauses the game and starts allowing actions again, used to keep in line with the disconnection resilience spec.

    • cutShort

      public void cutShort()
      Skips to the result screen, used to keep in line with the disconnection resilience spec.

    • startGame

      public void startGame()

    • getStarted

      public boolean getStarted()

    • getState

      public GameState getState()

    • setState

      public void setState(GameState next)
      Sets the next {GameState, if next is null, then the game is over.
      Parameters:
      next - {GameState State to set and initialize.

    • connect

      public void connect(ClientDescriptor client)
      Connect a ClientDescriptor to the model.
      Parameters:
      client - ClientDescriptor Client connecting to the model.

    • disconnect

      public void disconnect(ClientDescriptor client)
      Disconnect a ClientDescriptor to the model.
      Parameters:
      client - ClientDescriptor Client disconnecting from the model.

    • connect

      public void connect(Player p)
      Connect a Player to the model.
      Parameters:
      p - Player Player connecting to the model.

      public LobbyController getController()

    • afterSerialRestart

      public void afterSerialRestart()
      Routine to restart game after a crash or closing, creates a ResumeWaitingState linked to the previous {GameState and sets it as the game state.

    • broadcast

      public void broadcast(ClientMessage message)
      Requests the LobbyController to broadcast a ClientMessage to all connected listeners.
      Parameters:
      message - ClientMessage Message to be broadcast.

    • getEntry

      public ClientGameListEntry getEntry()
      Returns:
      ClientGameListEntry An entry containing info about this ModelInstance to be sent to a client.

    • endGame

      public void endGame()
      Requests the LobbyController to end the game and all associated resources.
